DOC.brief_summary: Objective study evaluate effect combination oral Coenzyme Q10 ( CoQ10 ) , clomiphene citrate ( CC ) ovulation induction CC-resistant polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) .In prospective control randomized trial perform university hospital private practice set . One hundred ten infertile woman PCOS resistant CC randomize either combine CC/CoQ10 ( 51 patient , 82 cycle ) CC 150 mg/day alone ( 50 patient , 71 cycle ) ovulation induction patient CC-resistant PCOS . Main outcome measure : Number follicle , serum E2 , serum P , endometrial thickness , pregnancy rate ( PR ) miscarriage rate .
DOC.brief_title: Coenzyme Q10 Clomiphene Citrate ( CC ) Ovulation Induction Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis PCOS base revised 2003 consensus diagnostic criterion longterm health risk relate PCOS ( 2003 ) . All woman previously treat 100 mg CC daily 5 day per cycle , two three cycle persistent anovulation ovulate thin endometrium < 5 mm time hCG administration patient hyperprolactinaemia , hypercorticism thyroid dysfunction . patient receive medication cholesterol lower drug , statin , betablockers , tricyclic antidepressant
